      • execSQL

        public static void execSQL(java.lang.String sql,
                           io.vertx.core.json.JsonArray params,
                           io.vertx.core.Vertx vertx,
                           io.vertx.core.Handler<Result> handler,
                           DataResultCreator resultCreator)
        Execute an sql statement with optional parameters. Any sql exceptions will be handled here and wrapped in Result
        Parameters:
        sql - the sql statement to be executed
        params - an array of parameters which may be null or empty
        vertx - the Vertx object
        handler - a handler to process the async result
        resultCreator - a method to create a Result for the data returned in AsyncResult NOTE : Use of Vert.x SQL 'call', 'callWithParams' to call functions does not seem to work (Not Implemented) for postgresql
